title: Chef Tom Colicchio, Duke Wins, Arkansas Upsets Gonzaga And More March Madness
description:
March Madness turns into March Sadness as Duke rips PFT and Big Cats hearts out and Hank gets to gloat. We recap all the games form Thursday night as well(00:02:08-00:24:51) as Tyreek Hill to the Dolphins and other NFL news.(00:24:52-00:33:27) Chef Tom Colicchio joins the show to talk about food, nftâ€™s, top chef and tons more.(00:35:36-01:21:25) We finish the show with Fyre Fest of the Week(01:23:21-01:44:24)


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/PardonMyTake
